createMultiplayerGame(address[],uint256).details: Creates a multiplayer game room. Called by the backend. Assumes all players have already approved this contract to spend their VCOIN.

params._players: An array of player addresses in the game.
params._stakeAmount: The amount each player is staking.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settleMultiplayerGame(uint256,address).details: Settles a multiplayer game. Called only by the backend.

params._gameId: The ID of the game to settle.
params._winner: The address of the winning player.

settleSinglePlayerGame(address,uint256).details: Settles a single-player game. Called only by the backend.

params._actualDuration: The player's actual completion time in seconds.
params._player: The address of the player whose game is being settled.

stakeForSinglePlayer(uint256,uint256).details: Allows a player to stake VCOIN on a personal challenge. The player must have approved this contract to spend their VCOIN first.

params._amount: The amount of VCOIN to stake.
params._targetDuration: The target completion time in seconds.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
